p: For the purpose of data collection an online survey was conducted via Tencent. The Tencent link was shared through the WeChat, the most popular and mostly use social media in China. A total of 1074 people were participated in the present study. Respondents, participated in the survey, received a gift voucher worth of 10 Yuan. Participantsâ€™ age ranged from 14 years to 68 years (M = 33.54 years, SD = 11.13 years). Demographic characteristics of participants presented in Table 1 .
